backend/main.mo: Main actor implementing a jewelry order management system with order tracking (CO/RB/SO types, Pending/Ready/Hallmark statuses), design mappings, karigar management, blob storage for design images and Excel files, and functions for order lifecycle including supply, return, and status updates.
backend/migration.mo: Empty migration module with a no-op run function that returns an empty ActorState.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two high-confidence fixes: EditDesignModal mutation response handling in UnmappedCodes.tsx, and mark-as-Ready functionality for SO/CO orders in OrderTable and TotalOrdersTab components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of frontend components including routing, dashboard tabs with filtering/search, order management tables, karigar detail views, Excel upload/parsing for master designs and order ingestion, and various UI components with mobile responsiveness.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, defining colors for UI elements including sidebar, charts, and semantic tokens (primary, secondary, destructive, etc.).
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with UTF-8 charset, viewport meta tag, title 'Jewellery Order Management System', and script loading main.tsx module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with 8 routes (dashboard, ingest orders, unmapped codes, master designs, design images, tag printing, barcode scanning, karigar detail), QueryClient, ThemeProvider, sidebar layout, and Toaster for notifications.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Custom: Tab component displaying only CO (Customer Order) type orders with Pending status, featuring search by order number and using OrderTable for display with client-side filtering via useMemo.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Design: Modal dialog component for viewing design images with zoom controls (0.5x-3x), pan functionality via mouse/touch events, loading/error states, and integration with useGetDesignImage hook.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Hallma: Displays hallmark orders with filters for order type (CO/RB), karigar, search text, and date range. Fetches hallmark orders and unique karigars, then filters and displays them in an OrderTable.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Kariga: Shows pending orders grouped by karigar name in card format, displaying total orders and weight per karigar. Clicking a card navigates to a detailed karigar view.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/OrderT: Reusable table component for displaying orders with optional bulk selection, design image modal, export functionality (Excel/PDF/JPEG), and mark-as-ready action. Handles both RB orders (via supply dialog) and SO/CO orders (via confirmation dialog).
frontend/src/components/dashboard/ReadyT: Displays orders with Ready status, filtered by order type, karigar, search text, and date range (using updatedAt). Deduplicates orders by orderId before rendering in OrderTable.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Summar: Displays four summary metric cards (total orders, weight, quantity, customer orders) filtered based on the active tab (total/ready/hallmark/customer/karigars). Includes deduplication logic for ready orders.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Suppli: Dialog for entering supplied quantity for RB orders before marking as ready. Handles single order (with quantity input validation) or multiple orders (supplies full quantity for each).
frontend/src/components/dashboard/TotalO: Displays a filterable table of pending and returned-from-hallmark orders with filters for order type, karigar, and search by order number. Handles marking RB-type orders as ready by opening a supplied quantity dialog.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Unmapp: Shows an alert banner for orders with unmapped design codes, grouping them by design and indicating missing generic or karigar names. Provides navigation buttons to view all unmapped codes or update master designs.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppSideba: Renders the main application sidebar with navigation menu items (Dashboard, Ingest Orders, Master Designs, etc.) and a data reset option. Includes branding header and footer with attribution to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/layout/DataReset: Confirmation dialog for resetting active orders, permanently deleting all orders with Pending or ReturnFromHallmark status. Uses mutation hook to execute the reset and displays success/error toasts.
frontend/src/components/masterdesigns/Ed: Modal dialog for editing design-to-karigar mappings, allowing selection of existing karigars or adding new ones. Updates the mapping and reassigns pending orders to the new karigar upon save.
frontend/src/components/tagprinting/Webv: Full-screen modal that embeds an external MPN system URL in an iframe with loading state. Provides a sandboxed environment for users to complete login in the external system.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state. Invalidates and refetches dependent queries when the actor changes due to identity updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and filtering orders (by status, type, karigar, hallmark), enriching order data with design mappings, and performing bulk status updates.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark themes, defining color schemes (including gold accents), transitions, hover states, and focus styles for the jewelry management UI.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/BarcodeScanning.tsx: Implements barcode scanning page supporting both hardware scanners (via keyboard events) and camera-based QR scanning, allowing bulk order status updates after collecting scanned order IDs.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard page with tabs for viewing total orders, ready orders, hallmark orders, customer orders, and karigars, plus summary cards and an unmapped section.
frontend/src/pages/DesignImages.tsx: Handles bulk design image uploads via folder selection or ZIP file, extracting filenames as design codes and uploading images to the backend in batches with progress tracking.
frontend/src/pages/IngestOrders.tsx: Handles bulk order ingestion from Excel files, parsing orders and saving them in batches with progress tracking and error reporting. Validates design mappings exist before saving orders.
frontend/src/pages/KarigarDetail.tsx: Displays detailed view of orders assigned to a specific karigar with summary statistics, export functionality (PDF/JPEG), and ability to mark orders as ready with supplied quantity dialog for RB orders.
frontend/src/pages/MasterDesigns.tsx: Manages master design mappings by uploading Excel files containing design codes, generic names, and karigar assignments. Handles bulk upload, karigar creation, and automatic order reassignment with progress tracking.
frontend/src/pages/TagPrinting.tsx: Provides interface for printing tags for ready orders via MPN system integration. Includes webview modal for MPN login and batch processing of orders with progress tracking.
frontend/src/pages/UnmappedCodes.tsx: Displays and allows editing of design codes from orders that lack generic name or karigar assignments. Groups unmapped orders by design code and enables inline editing to create mappings.
frontend/src/utils/excelParser.ts: Parses Excel files containing order data, normalizing design codes to uppercase and validating required fields (Order No, Order Type, Product, Design). Processes data in chunks to avoid UI blocking and returns parsed orders with any validation errors.
frontend/src/utils/exportUtils.ts: Provides functions to export orders to Excel and PDF formats. PDF export includes design images fetched from backend, groups orders by design code sorted numerically, and handles iOS-specific rendering with base64-encoded images.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom theme extensions including color schemes (using OKLCH), typography with Inter and Playfair Display fonts, container settings, and design tokens for sidebar, charts, and UI components.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking known issues with Unmapped Codes mapping updates and Dashboard Ready status for SO/CO order types, along with pending and completed feature requests to fix these issues.
